title: How It Works
summary: Professional drone training pathway - from quick assessment to certification and earning potential

sections.heading: Quick Assessment
body: Take our comprehensive drone career assessment to identify your optimal training path
Answer questions about your background, interests, and career goals
Get matched with the right industry focus and certification level

sections.heading: Submit Your Answers
body: Complete your personalized assessment with detailed responses
Our system analyzes your experience and goals
Advanced matching algorithm considers your unique profile

sections.heading: Course Matching & Pricing
body: Get matched with certified training providers
Access exclusive training packages and discounts

sections.heading: Next Steps
body: Connect with industry experts and mentors

faq.q: How long does the assessment take?
faq.a: The comprehensive assessment takes approximately 1-3 minutes to complete. Our system provides instant results upon submission.

faq.q: Is the career report really free?
faq.a: Yes, your personalized drone career report is completely free. We believe everyone should have access to quality career guidance.
We cover all major drone industry sectors including construction, agriculture, film/TV, asset inspection, real estate, mining, and emergency services.
